titleStmt.title: The copie of a letter sent from the Lord chiefe justices and privie councellours in Ireland, to the Lords assembled in Parliament here in England, bearing date the 25. of Octob. 1641. Together with a true discoverie of the plot, and the manner thereof to have beene effected there.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Justices and Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.P. and M.S. for Samuel Man, dwelling in St. Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Swan,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: St. Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Swan
